ai.help.set: Set the default LLM in session.
ai.help.list: See the list of supported LLMs.
ai.message.text2img.error:
(An error occurred: Unable to correctly convert the following content into images. Here is the original text output:
${text})
ai.message.list.prompt: 以下为可用的大语言模型：
ai.message.list.none: 找不到可用的大语言模型，请联系机器人拥有者添加。
config.comments.anthropic_api_url: API address of Anthropic API. (For ai module)
config.comments.deepseek_api_url: API address of DeepSeek API. (For ai module)
config.comments.llm_max_tokens: Limit the maximum number of tokens for LLMs.
config.comments.llm_temperature: The temperature sampling of the LLMs, ranging from 0-2. It is not recommended to modify it at the same time as top_p.
config.comments.llm_top_p: The nucleus sampling of the LLM, ranging from 0-1. It is not recommended to modify it at the same time as temperature.
config.comments.openai_api_url: API address of OpenAI API. (For ai module)
